credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: L'Estate
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
description: Ceres and Cybele seated on mound in center. Kneeling girl offers her grain. Group composed of girl and two young men embracing each other, stand at left. Cupid standing behind Ceres pointing bow at group. Woman sleeps upon sheafs of grain.
name: Drawing
